name: MusicBump🎶
description:
💎MusicBump⏬

⏰What's waiting for you🔽
      A lovely❤️ created game, where you have to dodge obstacles💣  and explore a 
      huge variety of colorful🎨  stages with different 📈difficulty statuses.

⚔️ Game Features🔽
      💯 Free to play
       ⏲ Endless gameplay
      💣 Difficulty increase
      🤸🏻‍♂️ Simple movement controls
       🎵 Lovely music
       ⚙️Settings

📲Controls🔽
     👆🏼Swipe your finger across the display
     🔴Do not touch the wrong color🎨 with your player🚗

✏️What do you need🔽
      🔋Full Mobile Phone
      📱 Touch Screen
      📀Disk Space
      🛌Cozy Place

🎈What do you obtain🔽
    ❤️ A nice game
    🤣 Fun
    😃 Good Mood
     
🌅Coming Soon🔽
      🎶 Add your own Music
      🎁Multiple Skins
      🛒Ingame Shop

📰If you want to be UpToDate🔽
     📹Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/confusingfuturegames/
     🎥YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1cDfmhZdtem9BmUFAJCpfw
     📡Webside: https://confusingfuturegames.jimdofree.com/
